name: To The Spaceport
description:
This is a project I've been sat on for a while, which I've just polished enough to want to release. It's very short and probably won't be taken any further
To The Spaceport is a sci-fi platformer following a young traveller attempting to leave his war torn home planet. In this demo the first level is available, set in an underground city built of shipping containers that you traverse

Credits:

  • Art - penusbmic's sci-fi packs
  • Music - DOS88 - Far Away
